title: I select to remember personal certificate decision "Permanently", but Firefox asks again at every connection to the server.
content:
When web servers request client certification, Firefox asks me which personal certificate to be used to the session to the web server, and asks this decision to be remember or not, too. So I select Remember this decision "Permanently", but Firefox asks again at next web connection.

I know before 138.0 decisions remembered permanently, but Firefox 140 forgets any certi decision immediately.
creator: tanimachi

title: address bar and other buttons not working
content: After the latest update (142) the only button that you can click is the home that will work. The address bar and search and nothing else will do anything. What is causing this? Thanks
creator: BLUEEYES4US

title: How in bookmarks to move a folder accidentally moved into the bottom of another folder back into bookmarks?
content:
How in bookmarks to move a folder accidentally moved into the bottom of another folder back into bookmarks?

Touching the folder with the cursor, pressing neither button on the mouse expands the folder to the left.

There are options to cut, copy, paste, but do not seem to work.
creator: johnlk99

title: Going to a new computer, want to take bookmarks and passwords
content:
Getting ready to replace my computer. Is there a way to take my Firefox bookmarks and passwords along with me. I know there are 2 profiles in different directories.

c:\users\jer\appdata\roaming\mozilla\firefox\profiles AND c:\users\jer\appdata\local\mozilla\firefox\profiles

Don't really know difference between roaming and local, except roaming is a lot bigger.

I doubt I could copy the whole profiles as they would contain information that is about current computer and wouldn't work on new computer. However, it seems that I have read or seen there are files within these profiles that just contain my bookmarks and passwords and they can be moved to another profile.

I just need to know the name of the files that hold his information.

Any help would be appreciated.
creator: diverjer
